lá em baixo

lá em cima
up there, upstairs

lá pelas oito horas
at about (around) eight o’clock

levar a cabo
to carry out, fulfill

levar a mal
to take amiss

levar a sério
to take seriously

levar a sério
to take something seriously

levar a vida na flauta

levar em conta
to take into account

levar jeito para
to be gifted in something (music, etc)

ligar o rádio
to turn on the radio

logo que
as soon as l
